@
lauried
225
Jan 8, 2025
Magnificent trees that required lots of shot shaping, shot variety and accuracy. Great Tee Pads, good signage & good clean washrooms.  A fabulous course!
1
@
cujo93830
385
Jan 3, 2025
Played in early January 2025. Not a bad course but in no way is this top 5 in the state. Seems a standard park style course. Playing in for the Trailblazer Tournament.  Course is very scorable relative to par. Having multiple pads and baskets gives in an extra half star
1
@
tjader15
400
Mar 17, 2024
Beautiful course
After playing

Frequently asked questions
How do I get to Champions Pointe DGC?
You can get directions to
Champions Pointe DGC
by clicking
Get Directions
, which will open your device's map application with the disc golf course location. The disc golf course is located
at 28.570334868820623, -81.78059673929363
in
Groveland, FL
.
Do I need to pay to play disc golf at Champions Pointe DGC?
Champions Pointe DGC
is free to play! Just show up and enjoy the disc golf course.
What is the difficulty and length of Champions Pointe DGC?
Champions Pointe DGC
has
18
disc golf holes
and has a difficulty rating of
"
Moderate
"
and
"
Hard
"
.
The typical disc golf round at
Champions Pointe DGC
takes about
2
hour
s
and covers approximately
2.4
miles (
3.9
km).
How highly rated is Champions Pointe DGC by the disc golf community?
Champions Pointe DGC
has an average rating of
4.6
out of 5 stars based on
3735
community
reviews
.
This is considered an excellent course rating by the disc golf community.
What amenities are available at Champions Pointe DGC?
Champions Pointe DGC
offers the following amenities:
18 disc golf holes, restrooms, drinking water, cart-friendly paths, pet-friendly areas
.
When is the best time to play at Champions Pointe DGC?
Upgrade to UDisc Pro to see detailed course traffic patterns and find the best times to play disc golf here.
How can I track my disc golf round at Champions Pointe DGC?
You can track your disc golf round using the UDisc mobile app. If on your phone, click the "Start a Round" button at the bottom of this page to begin navigating
Champions Pointe DGC
and tracking your disc golf round. The app provides GPS-enabled disc golf hole maps, scorekeeping, and stats tracking.
Upgrade to UDisc Pro for advanced features like detailed statistics and course traffic information.

Our mission
Empower the world to play more disc golf
It all starts with helping...
Players
Providing players with the tools they need to find and navigate courses, keep score, track their improvement, and connect with fellow disc golf enthusiasts
Organizers
Supporting organizers with a free platform to run the leagues and events that grow local communities
Ambassadors
Supplying course designers, clubs, and ambassadors with the data they need to legitimize their efforts and quantify their impact as they build new courses or improve and maintain existing ones
About the team
Now the industry standard for measuring disc golf participation, infrastructure, and reach, UDisc has grown from a two-person hobby project born of the desire to find courses into a team of 23 passionate disc golfers. The company also releases annual rankings of the world's best disc golf courses, and its Disc Golf Health Index focuses on the places where adding the sport can be most impactful. With millions of downloads on the App Store and Google Play, it is the #1 app for disc golfers.

Frequently asked questions
How do I get to Champions Pointe DGC?
You can get directions to
Champions Pointe DGC
by clicking
Get Directions
, which will open your device's map application with the disc golf course location. The disc golf course is located
at 28.570334868820623, -81.78059673929363
in
Groveland, FL
.
Do I need to pay to play disc golf at Champions Pointe DGC?
Champions Pointe DGC
is free to play! Just show up and enjoy the disc golf course.
What is the difficulty and length of Champions Pointe DGC?
Champions Pointe DGC
has
18
disc golf holes
and has a difficulty rating of
"
Moderate
"
and
"
Hard
"
.
The typical disc golf round at
Champions Pointe DGC
takes about
2
hour
s
and covers approximately
2.4
miles (
3.9
km).
How highly rated is Champions Pointe DGC by the disc golf community?
Champions Pointe DGC
has an average rating of
4.6
out of 5 stars based on
3735
community
reviews
.
This is considered an excellent course rating by the disc golf community.
What amenities are available at Champions Pointe DGC?
Champions Pointe DGC
offers the following amenities:
18 disc golf holes, restrooms, drinking water, cart-friendly paths, pet-friendly areas
.
When is the best time to play at Champions Pointe DGC?

How can I track my disc golf round at Champions Pointe DGC?
You can track your disc golf round using the UDisc mobile app. If on your phone, click the "Start a Round" button at the bottom of this page to begin navigating
Champions Pointe DGC
and tracking your disc golf round. The app provides GPS-enabled disc golf hole maps, scorekeeping, and stats tracking.
